contentrichtext.text: '''Vonn Ströpp''' or '''Vonn Stropp''' (1962, [[Stanwell]], [[England]]) is the most-used of over 123 [[pseudonym]]s used by a [[Outsider Art|visionary]] [[Painting|painter]] whose work has been described as "a kind of [[Pre-Raphaelite Brotherhood|pre-Raphaelite]] [[Psychedelic art|psychedelia]]".<ref>Preview events: Unquiet Voices, Iain Aitch, ''The Guardian'', London, October 11, 2003</ref> The son of a [[Schizophrenia|schizophrenic]] Irish father, he often speaks of a dismal childhood. Self-taught artistically, he began at age eleven to have what he described as visionary experiences. After dropping out of school, and working several low-level jobs, he began to paint obsessively. Von Ströpp, who now lives in [[Hounslow]], claims that, for him, the experience of painting is very painful, which he compares to [[crucifixion]]. An [[oil painting|oil painter]], with a [[surrealism|surrealist]] style somewhat comparable to that of [[Salvador Dalí]], his works are mainly scenes and [[Landscape art|landscape]]s, often with [[apocalyptic]] overtones. His work has been widely exhibited at venues including the [[Collection de l'art brut]], [[Lausanne]], the [[American Visionary Art Museum]], [[Baltimore]], and the [[Bethlem Royal Hospital]] Museum. [[Jimmy Page]] and [[Michael Stipe]] are collectors.<ref>[http://www.artofimagination.org/Pages/VonStropp.html Von Stropp], Society for Art of Imagination</ref> ==See also== *[[Outsider Art]] ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== *[http://www.outsiderart.ws] www.outsiderart.ws (Large visionary painting by Vonn Stropp circa 1990) *[http://www.outsiderart.co.uk/stropp.htm Von Stropp], Henry Boxer Gallery *[http://www.britishoutsiderart.com/artists/vonn_stropp.aspx Vonn Ströpp], biography on the website of the British Outsider Art exhibition in Paris <br /> {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Stropp, Vonn | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = British artist | DATE OF BIRTH = 1962 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Stropp, Vonn}} [[Category:20th-century English painters]] [[Category:21st-century English painters]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:Outsider artists]] [[Category:1962 births]] {{UK-painter-stub}}
